医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明肠道噬菌体可能与哮喘的发生有关研究人员研究了生命早期肠道病毒组（特别是温带噬菌体类群）与儿童期哮喘发展之间的关系，同时考虑了与宿主遗传学和细菌组的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-suggests-gut-phages-may-be-involved-in-the-development-of-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-suggests-gut-phages-may-be-involved-in-the-development-of-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28599448-e1ea-4804-999e-675ed21ffbaf Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:37:00 -0500 Study suggests gut phages may be involved in the development of asthma
Copley 的新型自动化摇动平台减轻了 MDI 和鼻用药物产品测试的负担。 Copley Scientific 的最新一代 Vertus® 自动摇动平台可以轻松直观地将自动化集成到各种药品测试工作流程中，从而提高生产率、降低测试变异性并简化培训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/New-automated-shake-and-fire-platforms-from-Copley-cut-the-burden-of-MDI-and-nasal-drug-product-测试.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/New-automated-shake-and-fire-platforms-from-Copley-cut-the-burden-of-MDI-and-nasal-drug-product-测试.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db40f1a1-1e5a-461b-9b9a-940c96d8d937 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 09:56:00 -0500 New, automated shake and fire platforms from Copley cut the burden of MDI and nasal drug product testing.
综合分析超过 200 万份 SARS-CoV-2 样本，检测共感染和宿主内重组研究人员评估了全球超过 200 万例 SARS-CoV-2 病例中混合感染和宿主内重组的流行情况，并制定了准确识别和分析重组菌株的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Compressive-analysis-of-more-than-2-million-SARS-CoV-2-samples-detects-co-infections-and-intra-host-重组.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Compressive-analysis-of-more-than-2-million-SARS-CoV-2-samples-detects-co-infections-and-intra-host-重组.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f19ee4d-c73c-44bd-9b88-04e4be7b0789 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 09:55:00 -0500 Comprehensive analysis of more than 2 million SARS-CoV-2 samples detects co-infections and intra-host recombination
克服依从性挑战：创新贴剂可实现受控药物输送透皮给药的突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Overcoming-adherence-challenges-Innovative-patch-enables-control-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Overcoming-adherence-challenges-Innovative-patch-enables-control-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96d0369d-343a-4774-9b76-bbea9817ec46 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 09:50:00 -0500 Overcoming adherence challenges: Innovative patch enables controlled drug delivery
研究表明基于基因的筛查有望对抗结直肠癌芬兰赫尔辛基大学研究人员领导的一项研究表明，应该以更全面的方式评估结直肠癌的遗传风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-shows-promise-of-gene-based-screening-to-fight-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-shows-promise-of-gene-based-screening-to-fight-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=160215bc-9f68-4d33-9a83-251620b2e609 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 09:41:36 -0500 Study shows promise of gene-based screening to fight colorectal cancer
研究将青少年压力与晚年心脏代谢风险联系起来根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的一项新研究，在青少年时期到成年期间压力较高的年轻人比压力较小的同龄人更有可能患有高血压、肥胖和其他心脏代谢危险因素。美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-links-teenage-stress-to-cardiometabolic-risk-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-links-teenage-stress-to-cardiometabolic-risk-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26aa267a-d212-4161-8059-9ddb4faee723 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 09:33:07 -0500 Study links teenage stress to cardiometabolic risk later in life
研究人员揭示了遗传性基因变异在罕见血癌中的作用大规模遗传分析帮助研究人员揭示了一种罕见的血癌中癌症驱动基因突变与遗传性基因变异之间的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Researchers-uncover-the-role-of-inherited-genic-variants-in-rare-type-of-blood-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Researchers-uncover-the-role-of-inherited-genic-variants-in-rare-type-of-blood-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4405f24c-27f6-4cff-8c3e-ef02809f16ce Wed, 17 Jan 2024 09:21:39 -0500 Researchers uncover the role of inherited genetic variants in rare type of blood cancer
休假和休假期间工作是否与医生倦怠有关？医生每年休假天数之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Are-vacation-days-taken-and-working-while-on-vacation-associate-with-practician-burnout.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Are-vacation-days-taken-and-working-while-on-vacation- Associated-with-Physician-burnout.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37e1b3a0-eeb0-4b55-83b8-636370b6e41c Wed, 17 Jan 2024 09:16:00 -0500 Are vacation days taken and working while on vacation associated with physician burnout?
